front.title: IP Flow Information Accounting and Export Benchmarking Methodology

abstract.t: This document provides methodology and framework for quantifying performance impact of monitoring of IP flows on a network device andexport of this information to a collector. It identifies the rate atwhich the IP flows are created, expired and exported as theperformance metric. The metric is only applicable to the devicescompliant with the Architecture for IP Flow Information Export[RFC5470].
